headline: Solar Stocks Climb As This Leader Beats Views, Raises Sales Outlook
summary: Nextracker also raised its sales outlook.  Fremont, Calif.-based Nextracker said its backlog grew to a record of more than $5 billion, as CEO Dan Shugar cited accelerating global demand and healthy bookings for the company's solar tracking products.  The company — whose technology helps maximize solar power by moving panels to follow the sun's rays — said it's also getting early traction from its newly acquired businesses.
